header.description: The plugin adds new file utilities beyond what is provided in the standard FileUtils plugin.

step-type.name: Send SMTP Email

property-ui.label: To List
property-ui.description: Comma separated list of email addresses to send an email to

property-ui.label: Attachment
property-ui.description: The attachment (with full path) to send with the mail. Ex - /home/manisha/file.txt.

property-ui.label: SMTP Host
property-ui.description: The SMTP Host server (Ex: mail.smtp.host). If left blank, the Mail Server Host property from the General Settings will be retrieved. Must have General Settings privileges for this capability.

property-ui.label: SMTP Port
property-ui.description: The SMTP server port (Ex: mail.smtp.port). If left blank, the Mail Server Port property from the General Settings will be retrieved. Must have General Settings privileges for this capability.

property-ui.label: SMTP Secure TLS
property-ui.description: Select to enable SMTP TLS Security. (Ex: mail.smtp.starttls.enable) If left blank, the Secure Mail Server Connection property from the General Settings will be retrieved. Must have General Settings privileges for this capability.

property-ui.label: Sender Email Address
property-ui.description: THE SMTP Sender Email Address. If left blank, the Mail Server Sender Address property from the General Settings will be retrieved. Must have General Settings privileges for this capability.

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: THE SMTP username. The authentication properties will not be pulled from the General Settings.

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: THE SMTP password. The authentication properties will not be pulled from the General Settings.
